name: Coding-blog
tagline: A place to reflect on what I'm learning.
body:
### First Post
Whenever I start blogging, I wonder whether I might not be better off using my time some other way. I always seem to stick to it for a little while, but I don't have the sustain required to write consistently. However, I do seem to cycle back around to it eventually. I'm here now, aren't I? Here goes...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
